Subbed Projects.Show Name: Captain Tsubasa: Saikyou no Teki! Holland Youth

Good Comments: Never seen subs for this show before. Thanks a lot.
Bad Comments: Watched this while my sister was giving me a handjob. Unfortunately, I cannot say the same about this release as I can about the handjob.

Good Comments: Much better than Ayako. Only decent speedsubs.
thank you, finally a group that isn't weird in the head
There are phrases I know that for some reason even these guys weren't either able to understand or didn't care to TL Note for people who are not knowledgeable about Japanese.
Had some funky wording but better than most.
Bad Comments: Good and prompt, definitely recommended for IS.
sometimes, the wording sucked. Also, the punctuation was a single fail.
Good quality, consistent editing, and marginally fast, while not the fastest, releases.
An okay subs. But TL and timing could be improved. And some lines still a bit awkward. At least better than Ayako
Artifacts up the wazoo. Who keeps convincing EienShouko that he's an encoder? Better than Ayako isn't saying much.
good release speed, great raws, intelligible translations that feel natural when watching

many simple mistakes, you need someone who 1st language is English to help you.

most is ok tho
